endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all utility company assets, including substations and transmission lines.
Add a new infrastructure asset to the system, specifying details like type, location, and specifications.
Fetch the current status and detailed information for a specific asset.
Update the status or modify operational parameters of a specific asset.
Retrieve scheduled maintenance activities for all assets.
Schedule a maintenance activity for an asset, specifying date, time, and objectives.
Access GIS-based visual representations of assets, along with their status and distribution.
Create condition-based alerts for specific assets, defining trigger parameters.
Retrieve historical performance data for assets over a specified date range.
Remove an existing alert based on its identifier.
